entry.title: Home | AEM Boilerplate
entry.content: READ TIME 3 min /en-us/microsoft-fabric/blog/author/arun-ulagaratchagan After an unforgettable kickoff in Stockholm last year, the Microsoft Fabric Community Conference is returning to Europe—this time in the musical city of Vienna! From September 15–18, we’re bringing the Fabric community together at the Austria Center for a wealth of learning, connection, and inspiration. Bringing BASIC back: Microsoft’s 6502 BASIC is now Open Source /en-us/microsoft-fabric/blog/author/alok-pareek/en-us/windows-server/blog/author/kadri-umay /en-us/microsoft-fabric/blog/author/arun-ulagaratchagan
